Review Name: Just wow! and Excellent Installation by Voltas Review Description: Good Product, Sturdy plastic and installation was excellent by Voltas. Cooling is also excellent than I expected. I have 10 * 12 room with fully furnished cupboards. During night, turbo mode is effective and cools the room in 10 mins. Got this one for INR 30,500 with R32 gas. Its worth for the money I paid.
